edge: Annoyed bus passengers leading to driver abandoning Mary
Mary hitchhikes with Norm after being abandoned by the bus driver
Meeting Elizabeth while hitchhiking with Norm, leading to Mary gradually growing close to Elizabeth
Meeting Howard while traveling with Elizabeth, leading to Mary gradually growing close to Howard
Arriving on the scene of a breaking news story with Steve, leading to Mary accidentally falling into the mine shaft
Numerous deaf children stuck inside old mine collapse
Initially appearing as covering a breaking news story, Steve begins to realize Mary is a beautiful person in her unique way
Accidentally falling into the mine shaft while making a beeline for Steve, leading to Hartman being made to feel guilty by Elizabeth and Howard for getting Mary into this predicament
Letting Hartman take the credit for Mary's rescue plan, realizing she does not need Steve to be happy
